full_text: JEFFREY E. EPSTEIN HOUSEHOLD ACCOUNT 358 EL BRILLO WAY PALM BEACH, FL 33480 Date 4/15/09 2513 Fay to the Order of Getting Dimensions Inc. $ 2500.00 Twenty five hundred 00/100 Dollars COLONIAL BANK Palm Beach, Florida Time#: 04 - 358 24 Hr Call:877-502-2265 For Commence Work Hello Hellen: I need you to please cover this chck with funds, Mr. Epstein wants this job to start ASAP, please; also I need money to buy emergency lets for all cars, regards, Nfrodo Page 57 of 100 Public Records Request No.: 17-295 DOJ-OGR-00031996

Hello Hellen: I need you to please cover this chck with funds, Mr. Epstein wants this job to start ASAP, please; also I need money to buy emergency lets for all cars, regards, Nfrodo
Page 57 of 100 Public Records Request No.: 17-295

additional_notes: The document is a scanned image of a check and a handwritten note. The check is from Jeffrey E. Epstein's household account, dated 4/15/09, and is made out to Getting Dimensions Inc. for $2500.00. The handwritten note is addressed to Hellen and requests that she cover the check with funds and buy emergency lets for all cars. The document is part of a public records request (No.: 17-295) and is page 57 of 100.
